EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners (1392930277.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1392930277.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Larry, It was a pleasure speaking with you earlier today. I tried to give you a call for our 1:00 PM/4:00 EST call but was unable to reach you. To answer your questions, we have clients on the west coast, we have executives on the west coast and we have dedicated business managers focused by Region. We do a large amount of business in the west coast so I’m sure we could accommodate a potential client you are in talks with. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/all> - You can review our “Independent’s Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> I think you will find this very helpful in the planning stages of branching off and into the consulting world. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-m-moul.html> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/Y3NJC> Best, ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
